definition: root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
to trace something to its source (idiom)

sentences.english: Lafuma added a rubber toe strip to protect you from rocks and roots.
sentences.chinese: 拉弗馬增加了橡膠腳趾地帶，以保護您的岩石和根源。

sentences.english: Power-centralized political system is political origin of the debt.
sentences.chinese: 權力集中型政治體制是導致鄉鎮負債的政治根源。

sentences.english: And what is the root problem of sin?
We all need to appreciate these anxieties and their origins.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要理解這些焦慮和他們產生的根源。

sentences.english: "Servility" is obstruct the exercise of the right to freedom of the root.
sentences.chinese: “奴性性”是妨礙自由權利行使的根源。

sentences.english: This basic principle is what defiles the mind, and when the mind is defiled, every thought is defiled.
sentences.chinese: 就是這個基本根源玷污了我們的內心。

sentences.english: There are many ways conditioning, conditioning fluid to the source to find you you?
sentences.chinese: 調理的方法有很多，要調理液要找到你的根源呀？

sentences.english: Covetousness is the root of all evil.
sentences.chinese: 貪婪是一切邪惡的根源。

sentences.english: But I don't think the issue is, as Easterlin says, marriage.
sentences.chinese: 但我並不認爲問題的根源是像伊斯特林所說的婚姻。

sentences.english: Endogenous pro-inflammatory cytokine was contributed to the BRB breakdown.
sentences.chinese: 內源性的炎性因子是血一眼屏障破壞的根源。

sentences.english: And there lies another source of sourness.
sentences.chinese: 此外還存在另一種使壞的根源。

sentences.english: Human nature in its modernity is the deep social root for most ecological crisis.
sentences.chinese: 現代性的人性是生態危機的深刻根源。

sentences.english: And this origin exactly is "Sunmoon Mode" Lanhanzhi said.
sentences.chinese: 這個根源就是藍漢之說的“玄武模式”。

sentences.english: The root cause of the loss of CPAs sincerity lies in the deficiency of system proper.
sentences.chinese: 註冊會計師誠信缺失的根源在於制度缺陷。

sentences.english: It is also a major source of land and water degradation.
sentences.chinese: 它還是土地和水資源退化的一大根源。

sentences.english: So, where is the root of the problem?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，問題的根源在哪裏呢？

definition: to trace something to its source (idiom)
hard lump in the abdomen (in Chinese medicine)/crux of an issue/main point in an argument/sticking point/deadlock in negotiations
to pursue sth back to its origins/to trace back to the source/to get to the bottom of sth
criminal ringleader, main offender (idiom); main culprit/fig. main cause of a disaster
to trace sth back to its origin
